title: Add YouTube channel button on File 5

requirements.text: On the fifth story page (File 5), add a prominently styled button that opens https://www.youtube.com/@E.J-Money in a new browser tab when clicked. The button should be clearly visible and placed near the bottom of the page content, distinct from the existing previous/next navigation buttons.

quotes: On file 5 there should be a button that leads the reader to a page with this link- https://www.youtube.com/@E.J-Money

acceptanceCriteria: A button is visible only on the fifth story page (File 5).
Clicking the button navigates the user to https://www.youtube.com/@E.J-Money.
The link opens in a new browser tab (target='_blank' with appropriate rel attributes).
The button is visually distinct from the previous/next navigation buttons.
The button is not shown on any other story page (Files 1â€“4).

constraints: Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
The YouTube URL must be exactly https://www.youtube.com/@E.J-Money with no modifications.
nonGoals: Adding YouTube buttons or external links to any page other than File 5.
Embedding YouTube video content on the page.
Changing the existing navigation (previous/next) button behavior.
